t: Fix Frozen or Looping Screen on Fire Tablet - Amazon Customer Service
s: Restart your device to fix a frozen or looping screen during startup. Before restarting, charge your device for at least 30 minutes with an Amazon-branded power adapter. Hold the power button down for 40 seconds or until your device shuts off.
